name: DataCamp Donates
description: DataCamp is the world's leading platform for data science education, offering 350+ courses on Python, SQL, R, and Machine Learning.
benefits: Get a FREE 1-year DataCamp subscription exclusively for UIU DSC members. Access interactive courses, hands-on projects, and skill assessments to boost your data science skills.

name: United International University
description: UIU is a leading private university in Bangladesh committed to excellence in education and research.
benefits: Official university support including venue access, faculty mentorship, and institutional resources for club activities.
